reviewText: Really enjoyed by our 3 year old. Kipper Friendship Tales is easy for her to understand. The moral if great and there is not background clutter like you often see in other childrens cartoons. We all loved it and feel it is always appropriate for her to watch.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Kipper is really sweet, quiet, clever, and lovely. We all like that my son (3) watches it as his go-to cartoon. I find myself getting really annoyed with Pig, lol, but at least that means I'm invested in the characters as well. Highly recommend for the preschool set.

reviewText: Grand daughter loves watching kipper and the soothing voice kipper has along with the stories is why he is such a big hit with her.

reviewText: I don't usually like toddler shows, but Kipper is an exception. He has a delightful British accent. The scenarios are very simple, but not dumb down. My toddler actually picked up a lot of words from this show.

reviewText: Greatly enjoyed by young ones; my grandchildren can't wait to watch ALL the Kipper videos.

reviewText: My toddler loves kipper and this one was another new one we found.  It has great lessons about friendship, and every day things like the hiccups.  Another wonderful set of cartoons from the Kipper family.
